verses.name: Psalms 51:1
verses.text: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.

verses.name: Psalms 51:2
verses.text: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.

verses.name: Psalms 51:3
verses.text: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:4
verses.text: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.

verses.name: Psalms 51:5
verses.text: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
